rukus.text: 53|33|dau che  neah  tae anak( mou ham meat) min bankheunh anak del ban  berchenh( pi kompir kuor an)

53|38|daembi komaoy anak del sang babakamm ttuolobantouk champoh  babakamm robsa anakadtei .
53|39|haey samreab mnoussa lok min ttuol ban krawpi avei del  khluon ke ban broengobreng thveu noh laey .

53|50|haey pitabrakd nasa  trong ban bamphlanh krom a d mounke .
53|51|ning krom sa mou d .  haey trong minban bansaoltouk anaknea  mneak laey .

53|53|ning phoumi mou ta hvei kasa( phoumi robsa krom robsa lout) del trong  ban bamphlanh( thveu aoy kraleab pi leu chohkraom) .
